title: Pressure - force exerted on piston during process

content.description: A closed chamber filled with a gas that is modeled as ideal has a movable piston of area <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi></math>. The <math alttext="P V" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>PV</mi> </math> diagram shows three processes that make up Cycle <math alttext="X to Y to Z to X" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>X</mtext><mo>→</mo><mtext>Y</mtext><mo>→</mo><mtext>Z</mtext><mo>→</mo><mtext>X</mtext></math> through which the gas is taken. Process <math alttext="Z to X" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mtext>Z</mtext> <mo>→</mo> <mtext>X</mtext> </math> is isothermal.
content.question: What is the force exerted on the piston by the gas during Process <math alttext="X to Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext><mo>→</mo><mtext>Y</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, times V sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator P sub 1, end sub, times V sub 1, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, times A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator P sub 1, end sub, times A, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub 1, end sub, times A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
